languages.text: "Мы зовемся Пустотным братством — эдакий союз предприимчивых единомышленников, помогающий добропорядочным гражданам Империума избавляться от тяготящего их имущества".

traits.locale_text: "Мы зовемся Пустотным братством — эдакий союз предприимчивых единомышленников, помогающий добропорядочным гражданам Империума избавляться от тяготящего их имущества".

languages.text: "We call ourselves the Fellowship of the Void — an association of enterprising like-minded people who help the upstanding citizens of the Imperium rid themselves of the possessions that are weighing them down."
languages.original_text: "Мы зовемся Пустотным братством — эдакий союз предприимчивых единомышленников, помогающий добропорядочным гражданам Империума избавляться от тяготящего их имущества".

traits.locale_text: "We call ourselves the Fellowship of the Void — an association of enterprising like-minded people who help the upstanding citizens of the Imperium rid themselves of the possessions that are weighing them down."

"We call ourselves the Fellowship of the Void — an association of enterprising like-minded people who help the upstanding citizens of the Imperium rid themselves of the possessions that are weighing them down."

"We call ourselves the Fellowship of the Void — an association of enterprising like-minded people who help the upstanding citizens of the Imperium rid themselves of the possessions that are weighing them down."

"We call ourselves the Fellowship of the Void — an association of enterprising like-minded people who help the upstanding citizens of the Imperium rid themselves of the possessions that are weighing them down."

languages.text: “我们自称虚空协联。我们的组织由一群志同道合的人组成，帮助帝国的正直公民摆脱财产的重负。”
languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the Fellowship of the Void — an association of enterprising like-minded people who help the upstanding citizens of the Imperium rid themselves of the possessions that are weighing them down."

traits.locale_text: “我们自称虚空协联。我们的组织由一群志同道合的人组成，帮助帝国的正直公民摆脱财产的重负。”

languages.text: «Nos llamamos la Hermandad del Vacío. Somos una asociación de individuos emprendedores que ayudan a los fieles ciudadanos del Imperoum a deshacerse de las pertenencias que les lastran».
languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the Fellowship of the Void — an association of enterprising like-minded people who help the upstanding citizens of the Imperium rid themselves of the possessions that are weighing them down."

traits.locale_text: «Nos llamamos la Hermandad del Vacío. Somos una asociación de individuos emprendedores que ayudan a los fieles ciudadanos del Imperoum a deshacerse de las pertenencias que les lastran».

languages.text: 「うちらは自分たちを『虚空の仲間』と呼んでる…志を同じくする意欲的な奴らの集まりで、帝国の立派な市民の重荷になっている所有物を取り除く手助けをする慈善団体だ」
languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the Fellowship of the Void — an association of enterprising like-minded people who help the upstanding citizens of the Imperium rid themselves of the possessions that are weighing them down."

traits.locale_text: 「うちらは自分たちを『虚空の仲間』と呼んでる…志を同じくする意欲的な奴らの集まりで、帝国の立派な市民の重荷になっている所有物を取り除く手助けをする慈善団体だ」

languages.text: "Wir nennen uns selbst die Gefährten der Leere – ein Zusammenschluss aktiver Gleichgesinnter, die den aufrechten Bürgern des Imperiums helfen, sich von Besitztümern zu trennen, die sie nur belasten."
languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the Fellowship of the Void — an association of enterprising like-minded people who help the upstanding citizens of the Imperium rid themselves of the possessions that are weighing them down."

traits.locale_text: "Wir nennen uns selbst die Gefährten der Leere – ein Zusammenschluss aktiver Gleichgesinnter, die den aufrechten Bürgern des Imperiums helfen, sich von Besitztümern zu trennen, die sie nur belasten."

languages.text: « On nous appelle la Communauté du vide. On est une assos de jeunes esprits entreprenants. En gros, on aide les braves citoyens de l'Imperium à se débarrasser des possessions qui les encombrent. »
languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the Fellowship of the Void — an association of enterprising like-minded people who help the upstanding citizens of the Imperium rid themselves of the possessions that are weighing them down."

traits.locale_text: « On nous appelle la Communauté du vide. On est une assos de jeunes esprits entreprenants. En gros, on aide les braves citoyens de l'Imperium à se débarrasser des possessions qui les encombrent. »

languages.text: "Biz kendimize Uçsuz Kardeşliği diyoruz... Girişken ve kafadar insanlardan oluşan bir dernek olarak İmparatorluk'un namuslu yurttaşlarının onlara yük olan mallarından kurtulmasına yardım ediyoruz."
languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the Fellowship of the Void — an association of enterprising like-minded people who help the upstanding citizens of the Imperium rid themselves of the possessions that are weighing them down."

traits.locale_text: "Biz kendimize Uçsuz Kardeşliği diyoruz... Girişken ve kafadar insanlardan oluşan bir dernek olarak, İmparatorluk'un namuslu yurttaşlarının onlara yük olan mallarından kurtulmasına yardım ediyoruz."
